new_post_links_message: Type post links, separated by commas, with optional type separated by " is " (e.g. "www.example.com,www.example.com/page is page"):
new_post_tags_message: Type post tags, separated by commas (e.g. "tag1,tag2,tag3"):
new_post_schedule_message: Type post schedule, with format yyyy-MM-dd (e.g. 2022-06-17):
